recipe.title: Home Made English Muffins
recipe.ingredient: 1/2 teaspoon salt, dry yeast, sugar and baking powder
recipe.step: In a bowl mix two waters together and mix in yeast and set aside. In a separate bowl whisk all other dry ingredients. Make a well in the centre and add the wet ingredients. Mix until combined and add quarter cup to a medium hot pan that has been sprayed with a light coat of oil. Cook for 10 minutes and flip over and cook for a further 6 minutes.
